gal oya madolsima kadukarayen patan aragena bibila pradeshaya haraha galagena awith nilgala pahukarala iginiyagalata watila ethanin konduwatuwanata awith wirayadi ya pahukaragena oluwil walin muhudata bahinawa.oluwil walin pradhana gangawa muhudata bassata iginiyagalin passe gal oya ganga pahalata galanakota shakha kipekata bedenawa.kondawatuwanedi madugaha ala kiyala bedena shakhawa mewage ekak.ee bedenashakhawa ampara nagare pahukarala aapahu ekathuwenawa.mehema bedila galana shakha muhudata watenne wenawenama.ekashakhawak gal oyen bedila uthuru paththata galagena gihin karathiwu ampara pare mawadi palliya hariyedi para panala karawahu watte kalapuwata watila kallar walin muhudata watenawa.thawath shakhawak nindawur walin muhudata watenawa.thawath kotasak periya kalapuwa haraha addalachena pahu karala dakunu paththata gihin akkara paththuwen kalapuwata watenawa.ethakota eewathura muhudata galanne sinna muththuwarama periyamuththuwarama moyakatawal deken .mewidiyata gal oya muhudata watenna issella bedena shakhawal osse thamayi athithaye thibuna digamadulu mahawel yaya pihitalathibune.mekumbauru yaya mama kalin liwwa widiyata akkara hathalis dahakata wadiyi.me gal oye uthuru paththata galapu shakhawa watenakalapuwa madakalapuwa dakwath in uthurupaththatath pathirigiya wishala ekak .me kalapuwe thamayi parana madakalapu waraya thibune.madakalapuwa kiwwama apita mathak wenne warthamana madakalapuwa nagare.kalmune idan hathakma daha atak uthurin thiyena prasiddha madakalapu nagare hadenna patan ganne kri.wa.1628di.ee pruthugisi karayo horarahase puliyanthiwu dupathe balakotuwak hadanna patan ganimenuyi.eeta issella madakalapu waraya thibuna.mewaraya kalapuwe dakunu kelaware sammanthura hariye thibune..maha sagare gaman karapu yathra kallar walin kalapuwata athul karala dakunu paththata yathra karala sammanthure nathara karanawa.dan oya sammanthureyi kiyana nama hadila thiyenne oya waraya mul kara gena thamayi.samman kiyanne muhude badu bhanda prawahanayata pawichchi karapu yathra wargayak.thureyi kiyala demala bhashawen waraya nathnam thotupola kiyana ekayi.ethakota samman natharakarapu waraya samman thureyi una.oyawage sinhalabhashawa pawichchi karapu palatheth oya wage waraya nagarayak lankawe thiyenawa.ee hambanthota.ethana hamban kiyanne sammanma thamayi.demala bhashawen samman kiyapu eka sinhala uuruwata hamban una.demalen thureyi kiwwa eka sinhalen thota una.ee anuwa hamban thota haduna.
